name: America is Bleeding.
description:
You might be wondering why we brought you here. Why you woke up, alone, locked in a room.

America is bleeding. Our morals. Our freedom. Our integrity. All hemorrhaging from its decrepit form. We will put a stop to that.

You were recommended by someone you know. You'll know their name soon enough. We have a need for someone with your skillset. Someone who can analyze data and decipher obfuscated information.

Before we let you know who we are, you'll have to prove that you're good enough to join our organization. We have enough soldiers. More than anyone expects.

Answer the four questions correctly, and you're free to join us. Otherwise, well, let's hope it doesn't come to that.

--- ABOUT ---

America is Bleeding is an escape room-style puzzle game filled with puzzles that you might expect to see in an ARG. All the information is contained within the game (no websites or phone numbers will go out of service), but you might need to depend on external programs to help you solve the puzzles.

The game features an in-game hint system, and playing together with friends is recommended.

--- CONTROLS ---

While the majority of the game is playable with a controller, a keyboard is required for text entry. Controls are rebindable.

WASD/Left Stick - Movement

F/Bottom Button - Interact

Enter/Bottom Button - Select terminal option

Esc/Start - Menu/Pause

P/Back - Save current text to desktop
